# name

**Instance Property**

The playlist’s displayed name.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String { get }
```

## Metadata for a playlist

- **authorDisplayName**: App defined display name for the playlist.
- **descriptionText**: The descriptive text for the playlist.

items.description: App defined display name for the playlist.
items.name: authorDisplayName

items.description: The descriptive text for the playlist.
items.name: descriptionText

title: name
